## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have used meaningful variable and function names
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on at least one platform
- [ ] I have tested error cases and edge cases

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have added/updated code comments where necessary
- [ ] I have updated relevant examples

### Git Hygiene
- [ ] My commits are atomic and well-described
- [ ] My commit messages follow the Conventional Commits specification
- [ ] I have rebased my branch on the latest main
- [ ] I have resolved all merge conflicts

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have not added unnecessary dependencies
- [ ] If I added dependencies, I have justified them in the description
- [ ] All dependencies are properly licensed and compatible

### Breaking Changes
- [ ] If this is a breaking change, I have updated the CHANGELOG
- [ ] If this is a breaking change, I have provided migration instructions

## Post-Merge Checklist

<!-- For maintainers -->

- [ ] Update CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] Create/update migration guide if breaking change
- [ ] Update version number if applicable
- [ ] Create GitHub release if this completes a milestone
